title: Griddled chicken with mango and red onion salsa
description: This recipe proves exactly how versatile chicken can be. The mango and red onion salsa provides a fresh zingy kick.
ingredients: ½ a finely diced red onion
A large bunch of fresh parsley
A splash of red wine vinegar

method.Step 1: In a bowl, mix 1 chopped ripe mango, ½ finely diced red onion and plenty of chopped fresh parsley.

method.Step 2: Drizzle over 2 tbsp extra-virgin olive oil, a splash of red wine vinegar and a good pinch each of salt and sugar, then set aside.

method.Step 3: Flatten 2 chicken breasts between 2 sheets of cling film, rub with a halved garlic clove and a drizzle more of the olive oil, then season.

method.Step 4: Heat a griddle pan over a medium-high heat, then grill the chicken for 3-4 minutes on each side until cooked through. Serve with the salsa.
